title: Forbidden Kisses
description: From USA Today Bestselling Author Gail Haris, comes a second chance, emotional roller coaster read. This small town best friend's brother lures you in from the first page and holds you in a grip until the end.Two brothers, one baby.Both hold a piece of my heart…but only one is the father of my baby.Word spreads quickly in a small town, especially when the rumors include a Randall…The Randall brothers have always been a part of my life: one I kept secrets for, the other I hid feelings from.The first was my lifelong best friend, and his older brother was the crush I could never have.Until a tragedy threatens to expose all three of our secrets and lies.I should stay away from him, but what if I can’t resist his forbidden kisses?Originally published as The Night That Changed Rachel.
author: Gail Haris
